body:
Hi Jelle,


Try the following:


    ximage -ov [fname.pic] | rcalc -f xyz_rgb.cal -e
    '$1=X($1,$2,$3);$2=Y($1,$2,$3);$3=Z($1,$2,$3);'


-Jack




# Jack de Valpine
# president

# visarc incorporated
